feed.title: Category: angualr, | Maciej Kus is not a Figure Skater

entry.title: which vps app
entry.content:
I made a list of the best VPS hosting providers and threw that information into an angular.js webapp. I used bootstrap for the style of the page.

As far as I can tell the VPS hosts in the app are the most dependable and most well known in the industry. I hope the app is useful to those looking to get a new virtual private server.
